title: Joyce Rengal
description: When Joyce Rengal, a girl of the age of thirteen's, home is destroyed she sets out on a journey of revenge. On her way, she finds out many more terrible things about this dragon that killed her family. One of those things is the fact that, if not stopped soon enough, he will soon have the world under his evil rule. In order to stop him Joyce must find a single gem before the evil king.
author: D.R. Hennessy
